author: dragan2836472
content:
hey there, during the fellowship there were multiple people invloved with verkle trie, here are our presentations (cohort is ending this month):
https://app.streameth.org/devconnect/epf_day/session/verkle_in_nim

https://app.streameth.org/devconnect/epf_day/session/postverkle_state_expiry

https://app.streameth.org/devconnect/epf_day/session/verkle_tries_in_circuit

Would be cool to hear feedback from more senior people (or anyone) in the space (at least i would like to hear feedback)
